targets.rawSql: SELECT key AS dimension, ROUND(AVG(value::numeric), 2) AS avg_score FROM evaluations, jsonb_each_text(scores) WHERE overall_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY key ORDER BY avg_score DESC
SELECT evaluator_type, ROUND(AVG(overall_score)::numeric, 2) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS count FROM evaluations WHERE overall_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY evaluator_type ORDER BY avg_score DESC

SELECT date_trunc('day', e.created_at) AS time, evaluator_type, ROUND(AVG(overall_score)::numeric, 2) AS avg_score FROM evaluations e WHERE e.created_at > $__timeFrom() AND overall_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 1, 2 ORDER BY 1

SELECT ac.name AS agent, ac.model, ROUND(AVG(e.overall_score)::numeric, 2) AS avg_score, COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) AS conversations FROM evaluations e JOIN conversations c ON e.conversation_id = c.id JOIN eval_runs er ON c.eval_run_id = er.id JOIN agent_configs ac ON er.agent_config_id = ac.id WHERE e.overall_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ac.name, ac.model ORDER BY avg_score DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT ac.name AS agent, ac.model, ROUND(AVG(e.overall_score)::numeric, 2) AS avg_score, COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) AS conversations FROM evaluations e JOIN conversations c ON e.conversation_id = c.id JOIN eval_runs er ON c.eval_run_id = er.id JOIN agent_configs ac ON er.agent_config_id = ac.id WHERE e.overall_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ac.name, ac.model ORDER BY avg_score ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT overall_score FROM evaluations WHERE overall_score IS NOT NULL

SELECT ac.name AS agent, key AS dimension, ROUND(AVG(value::numeric), 2) AS avg_score FROM evaluations e JOIN conversations c ON e.conversation_id = c.id JOIN eval_runs er ON c.eval_run_id = er.id JOIN agent_configs ac ON er.agent_config_id = ac.id, jsonb_each_text(e.scores) WHERE e.overall_score IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ac.name, key ORDER BY ac.name, key

SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(CORR(h.overall_score, a.overall_score)::numeric, 3), 0) AS correlation FROM evaluations h JOIN evaluations a ON h.conversation_id = a.conversation_id WHERE h.evaluator_type = 'human' AND a.evaluator_type = 'model_judge'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM evaluations
SELECT evaluator_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM evaluations GROUP BY evaluator_type
